title: Something else To spend IP on
body:
Yo,

just wondering mostly if there is anything else to Spend my IP on other then Name Changes (i have no desire to do so) and future Released Champs

as i have capped out my Rune Pages, and max amout of runes purchased and also have Every Champ and other small thing you can buy with IP,

would also like to hear other Peoples Ideas for things that could be Bought with IP that isnt yet out.

replies.body: Keep saving up. Every 1,000,000 IP Riot will convert it into 1 RP

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nb2KEU5e,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-12T11:28:10.988+0000)
>
> Keep saving up. Every 1,000,000 IP Riot will convert it into 1 RP

XD
We're in the same boat. Not much to do, unfortunately. I've been massing IP for the last 2 years, and new champs have been my only expenses... Although a couple times they did release new runes.

It would be cool if some of the less-used skins would be made available to purchase with IP. 
- They could be around 6,800 IP, or higher even, and only really for those skins that do not generate sales. 
- Alternatively, a 1 skin per week sale, available to purchase for 10,000 IP. 
Each of these would provide a 'money-sink' to spend excess IP on, particularly useful and rewarding for those players (such as the OP), who have obviously dedicated a lot of time and money into LoL.
Stop playing until Riot makes something else to spend it on??   IDK??   I hope this never happens to me.
